name: craziness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 stupid and unreasonable behaviour, speech, situations, etc.: A moment's craziness had lost him his wife and his job. The public wants to stop the craziness of letting people who are criminals get guns.
offensive an offensive word for mental illness, or for behaviour that is considered typical of someone with a mental illness
More examplesFewer examplesHow can this craziness be happening in the 21st century?I tried to keep him out of the craziness of the celebrity world. It was like he'd been to a war and come back with this awful craziness.
